name: happytables
overview:
happytables provides restaurants with easy to build & maintain websites. The service is currently still in open beta.

Product Information - Using happytables, a restaurant owner can easily assemble a website for their establishment. A person will begin by choosing one of our base designs, uploading various imagery (logo, location photography, etc.) and easily selecting colors that match their existing brand. At that point, menus & events can easily be added and managed. This is all further enhanced by various Social Proof integration (Yelp, Foursquare, Qype, etc.) as well as SEO optimization (Schema.org).

History - happytables was previously Theme Force, and started early 2010 by selling WordPress themes to Restaurants and Pubs. Given the success, it was only natural that the business model progress to one that is more scalable (i.e. SaaS).
